title:
Complex $m$-Hessian type equations in weighted energy classes of
  $m$-subharmonic functions with given boundary value
authors: Nguyen Van Phu and Nguyen Quang Dieu
abstract:
In this paper, we concern with the existence of solutions of the complex
$m-$Hessian type equation $-\chi(u)H_{m}(u)=\mu$ in the class
$\mathcal{E}_{m,\chi}(f,\Omega)$ if there exists subsolution in this class,
where the given boundary value $f\in\mathcal{N}_m(\Omega)\cap MSH_m(\Omega).$
